name: My First Game Jam (b._.render)
description:
Hello Gamers and Game devs

I think I broke it again

        So far I have put together a basic template that I think I like. I looked into the graph edit nodes and would like to use that, but I have decided to move to a much more simple layout.

          I think with this project Im going to try to re-enforce the skills I have learned so far and see if that is enough to make something.
